00064 void BankHandler::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00065 {  
00066     switch (e->type)
00067     {
00068         case START:             
00069             if (HasWork())
00070             {
00071                 Request *req = new Request();   
00072                 int index=0;
00073                 bufferOccupancy++;
00074                 bufferSize += ((RankHandler*)myRank)->rbuffer[bankId].size();
00075                 if (IsBufferFull())
00076                     bufferFullCounter++;
00077 
00078                 if ( !((RequestHandler*)parent)->busHandler->IsFull(myChannel) &&
00079                        (((RequestHandler*)parent)->busHandler->linkBusy[myChannel] == false) &&
00080                      !((ResponseHandler*)((RequestHandler*)parent)->resPtr)->IsBufferFull() 
00081                      &&  ((RequestHandler*)parent)->busHandler->BankRankFree(bankId,((RankHandler*)myRank)->rankId,myChannel)
00082                      )
00083                 {               
00084                     if(MainScheduler(req,&index))  
00085                     {
00086                         vector<Request>::iterator bufferIndex = ((RankHandler*)myRank)->rbuffer[bankId].begin() + index;
00087                         req->tag = ((RequestHandler*)parent)->reqTag;
00088                         req->cbufferInsertionTime = (ullint)Simulator::Now()+1;
00089                         ((RequestHandler*)parent)->busHandler->LowLevelCmdGen(req);
00090                         ((RequestHandler*)parent)->busHandler->linkBusy[req->channelNo] = true;         
00091                         ((RequestHandler*)parent)->busHandler->oneReq[myChannel][((RankHandler*)myRank)->rankId][bankId] = true;
00092                         ((RankHandler*)myRank)->rbuffer[bankId].erase(bufferIndex);
00093 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00094 cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": 0x" << hex << req->address << ": Now I am in start with bank " << dec << req->bankNo << ", row " << req->rowNo <<" of BankHandler " << bankId << "\n";            
00095 #endif                  
00096                 if(!((RequestHandler*)parent)->busHandler->cmdIssuer[req->channelNo].generated_start_event)
00097                 {
00098                         ((RequestHandler*)parent)->busHandler->cmdIssuer[req->channelNo].generated_start_event = true;
00099                         IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent();
00100                         event->src = (Component*)this;
00101                         event->dst = (Component*)(&((RequestHandler*)parent)->busHandler->cmdIssuer[req->channelNo]);   
00102                         event->type = START;
00103                         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &CmdIssuer::process_event, (CmdIssuer*)event->dst, event);
00104                 }       
00105                         if (req->cmdType == CACHE_READ || req->cmdType == CACHE_PREFETCH || req->cmdType == CACHE_WRITE)
00106                         {
00107                             IrisEvent *event10 = new IrisEvent();                       
00108                             event10->src = (Component*)this;
00109                             event10->dst = (Component*)((RequestHandler*)parent)->resPtr;
00110 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00111                             cout << Simulator::Now() << ": 0x" << hex << req->address << ": I will be sending request of bank " << dec << req->bankNo << ", row " << req->rowNo <<" to ResponseHandler\n"; 
00112 #endif          
00113                             event10->event_data.push_back((void*)req);
00114                             event10->type = PUSH_BUFFER;
00115                             Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &ResponseHandler::process_event, (ResponseHandler*)event10->dst, event10);
00116                             ((RequestHandler*)parent)->reqTag = (((RequestHandler*)parent)->reqTag+1) % (RESPONSE_BUFFER_SIZE*2);       
00117                         }
00118                         else 
00119                             delete req;
00120                     }
00121                     else
00122                     {
00123                 //      RestorePrevState();     
00124                         delete req;
00125                     }   
00126                 }
00127                 else
00128                     delete req; 
00129                 if (!generated)
00130                 {
00131                 generated = true;
00132                 IrisEvent *event2 = new IrisEvent();
00133                 event2->src = (Component*)this;
00134                 event2->dst = (Component*)this; 
00135                 event2->type = CONTINUE;
00136                 Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &BankHandler::process_event, (BankHandler*)event2->dst, event2);
00137                 }
00138             }
00139             break;              
00140 
00141         case CONTINUE: 
00142             
00143                 generated = false; 
00144             if (bufferFull && !IsBufferFull())
00145             {
00146                 bufferFull = false;
00147                 IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent();
00148                 event->src = (Component*)this;
00149                 event->dst = (Component*)parent;
00150                 event->type = CONTINUE;
00151                 Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &RequestHandler::process_event, (RequestHandler*)event->dst, event);
00152             } 
00153 
00154             if (IsBufferFull())
00155                 bufferFullCounter++;
00156

00158             {
00159                 Request *req = new Request();

00237 bool BankHandler::HasWork()
00238 {
00239     if (((RankHandler*)myRank)->rbuffer[bankId].empty())
00240         return false;
00241     else 
00242         return true;
00243 }

00245 bool BankHandler::IsBufferFull()
00246 {
00247     if (((RankHandler*)myRank)->rbuffer[bufferId].size() >= MAX_BUFFER_SIZE)
00248     {
00249         bufferFull = true;      
00250         return true;
00251     }
00252     else 
00253         return false;
00254 }

00261 bool BankHandler::MainScheduler(Request *req, int* index) 
00262 {
00263     switch (dram_page_policy)
00264     {
00265         case OPEN_PAGE_POLICY:
00266         {
00267             switch (mc_scheduling_algorithm)
00268             {
00269                 case PAR_BS:
00270                 {
00271                     return PARBS(req,index);
00272                     break;
00273                 }
00274                 case FR_FCFS:
00275                 {
00276                     cout << "Jggffd" << endl;
00277                     return FRFCFS(req,index);
00278                     break;
00279                 }
00280                 case FC_FS:
00281                 {
00282                     return FCFS(req,index);
00283                     break;
00284                 }
00285                 default:
00286                 {
00287                     cout << "Wrong Scheduling Algorithm defined" << endl;
00288                     exit(1);
00289                 }
00290             }
00291             break;
00292         }
00293 
00294         case CLOSE_PAGE_POLICY:
00295         {
00296             return FCFS(req,index);
00297             break;
00298         }
00299 
00300         default:
00301         {
00302             cout << "Wrong Page Policy" << endl;
00303             exit(1);
00304         }
00305     }
00306     cout << "not a likely place" << endl; 
00307     exit(1);
00308     return false;
00309 
00310 }
00311 
00312 bool BankHandler::PARBS(Request *req, int* index)
00313 {
00314     UInt highest = FindHighest(); 
00315     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);                    
00316     if (!tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId].empty())
00317     {
00318         if (RowHitFirst(req,index))
00319             return true;
00320         else if (ReadsFirst(req,index))
00321             return true; 
00322         else if (HighestRankedFirst(req, highest,index))
00323             return true;
00324         else if (OldestFirst(req,index))
00325             return true;
00326         else if (!tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId].empty())
00327         {
00328             if(ScheduleUnmarked(req,index))
00329                 return true;
00330         }
00331         else 
00332             return false;
00333     }
00334     return false;               
00335 }

00337 bool BankHandler::FRFCFS(Request *req, int* index)
00338 {
00339     //   unsigned int i;
00340     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);    
00341     if (!tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId].empty())
00342     {
00343         if (RowHitFirst(req,index))
00344             return true;
00345         else if (ReadsFirst(req,index))
00346             return true; 
00347         else if (OldestFirst(req,index))
00348             return true;
00349         else 
00350             return false;
00351     }
00352     return false;
00353 }

00372 bool BankHandler::OldestFirst(Request* req, int* index)
00373 {
00374     unsigned int i;
00375     bool temp = false;
00376     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);    
00377     // RankHandler * tempRank = (RankHandler*)myRank;
00378     for (i=0; i<tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId].size(); i++)        
00379     {
00380         if (!tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId][i].mark)
00381             continue;
00382 
00383         *req = tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId][i];
00384         if (req->bankNo==bankId)
00385         {
00386             if (req->rowNo==rowBufferIndex && rowOpen)
00387                 req->status = OPEN;
00388             else if (rowOpen)
00389                 req->status = CONFLICT; 
00390             else
00391                 req->status = CLOSED;
00392             SetPrevState();
00393             SetReadsOWrite(OLDEST_FIRST,req->cmdType); 
00394             *index = i;
00395             rowBufferIndex = req->rowNo;
00396             if( dram_page_policy == OPEN_PAGE_POLICY)
00397                 rowOpen = true;
00398             else if ( dram_page_policy == CLOSE_PAGE_POLICY )
00399                 rowOpen = false;
00400             else
00401             {
00402                 cout << " Incorrect dram_page_policy " << endl;
00403                 exit (1);
00404             }
00405             temp = true;
00406             break;
00407         }
00408     }
00409     //    if (temp) cout << "Oldest " << req->status << endl;                           
00410     return temp;
00411 }

00413 bool BankHandler::RowHitFirst(Request* req, int* index)
00414 {
00415     unsigned int i;
00416     bool temp = false;
00417     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);
00418     for (i=0; i<tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId].size(); i++)        
00419     {
00420         if (!tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId][i].mark)
00421             continue;
00422 
00423         *req = tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId][i]; 
00424         if ( (req->bankNo==bankId) && (req->rowNo==rowBufferIndex) && rowOpen )
00425         {
00426 
00427             if (req->rowNo==rowBufferIndex && rowOpen)
00428                 req->status = OPEN;
00429             else if (rowOpen)
00430                 req->status = CONFLICT; 
00431             else
00432                 req->status = CLOSED;   
00433             //    req->indexWhenScheduled = i; 
00434             SetPrevState();
00435             SetBypasses(i);
00436             SetReadsOWrite(HIT_FIRST,req->cmdType);
00437             *index = i;
00438             rowBufferIndex = req->rowNo;
00439             rowOpen = true;     
00440             temp = true;        
00441             break;
00442         }
00443     }   
00444     //    if (temp) cout << "Hit " << req->status << endl;                      
00445     return temp;        
00446 }

00448 bool BankHandler::ReadsFirst(Request* req, int* index)
00449 {
00450     unsigned int i;
00451     bool temp = false;
00452     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);
00453     for (i=0; i<tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId].size(); i++)        
00454     {
00455         if (!tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId][i].mark)
00456             continue;
00457 
00458         *req = tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId][i];
00459         if ( (req->bankNo==bankId) && 
00460              (req->cmdType == CACHE_READ || req->cmdType == CACHE_PREFETCH || req->cmdType == CACHE_WRITE) && 
00461              (tempRank->readsOWrite<MAX_READ_OV_WRITE) )
00462         {
00463             if (req->rowNo==rowBufferIndex && rowOpen)
00464                 req->status = OPEN;
00465             else if (rowOpen)
00466                 req->status = CONFLICT; 
00467             else
00468                 req->status = CLOSED;   
00469             //    req->indexWhenScheduled = i;
00470             SetPrevState();
00471             SetBypasses(i); 
00472             SetReadsOWrite(READS_FIRST,req->cmdType);   
00473             *index = i;
00474             rowBufferIndex = req->rowNo;
00475             rowOpen = true;
00476             temp = true;
00477             break;
00478         }
00479     }   
00480     //    if (temp) cout << "Reads " << req->status << endl;                            
00481     return temp;        
00482 }

00484 bool BankHandler::ScheduleUnmarked(Request *req, int* index)
00485 {
00486     //    cout << "Maybe here I came" << endl;  
00487     unsigned int i;
00488     bool temp = false;
00489     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);
00490     for (i=0; i<tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId].size(); i++)        
00491     {
00492         *req = tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId][i];
00493         if ( req->bankNo==bankId )
00494         {
00495             if (req->rowNo==rowBufferIndex && rowOpen)
00496                 req->status = OPEN;
00497             else if (rowOpen)
00498                 req->status = CONFLICT; 
00499             else
00500                 req->status = CLOSED;   
00501             //    req->indexWhenScheduled = i;
00502             SetPrevState();
00503             SetReadsOWrite(UNMARKED_FIRST,req->cmdType); 
00504             *index = i;
00505             rowBufferIndex = req->rowNo;
00506             rowOpen = true;
00507             temp = true;
00508             break;
00509         }
00510     }
00511     //    if (temp) cout << "Unmarked " << req->status << endl;                                         
00512     return temp;

00515 bool BankHandler::HighestRankedFirst(Request *req, UInt highest, int* index)
00516 {
00517     unsigned int i;
00518     bool temp = false;
00519     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);
00520     for (i=0; i<tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId].size(); i++)        
00521     {
00522         if (!tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId][i].mark)
00523             continue;
00524 
00525         *req = tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId][i];
00526         if (req->bankNo==bankId && (req->threadId==highest) )
00527         {
00528             if (req->rowNo==rowBufferIndex && rowOpen)
00529                 req->status = OPEN;
00530             else if (rowOpen)
00531                 req->status = CONFLICT; 
00532             else
00533                 req->status = CLOSED;
00534             //    req->indexWhenScheduled = i;
00535             SetPrevState();
00536             SetBypasses(i);     
00537             SetReadsOWrite(HIGHEST_RANKED_FIRST,req->cmdType); 
00538             *index = i;
00539             rowBufferIndex = req->rowNo;
00540             rowOpen = true;
00541             temp = true;
00542             //      cout << Simulator::Now() << ": I came here" << endl;        
00543             break;
00544         }
00545     }   
00546     //    if (temp) cout << "Highest Ranked " << req->status << endl;           
00547     return temp;        
00548 }
00549 
00550 UInt BankHandler::FindHighest()
00551 {
00552     unsigned int i,j,k;
00553     int maxBankLoad[NO_OF_THREADS];     
00554     int totalLoad[NO_OF_THREADS];
00555     //   bool flag=0;
00556     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);    
00557 
00558     for (k=0; k<NO_OF_THREADS;k++)              // For Each Thread
00559     {   
00560         maxBankLoad[k]=0;                       // Assign maxBankLoad & totalLoad to 0
00561         totalLoad[k]=0;                         
00562         for (i=0;i<NO_OF_BUFFERS;i++)                   // for each Bank
00563         {
00564             int bankLoad=0;
00565             for (j=0; j<tempRank->rbuffer[i].size(); j++)       
00566             {   
00567                 if (tempRank->rbuffer[i][j].mark==true && tempRank->rbuffer[i][j].threadId==k)
00568                 {       
00569                     bankLoad++;
00570                     totalLoad[k]++;                     // Set Total Load of a Thread k here as well
00571                 }
00572             }
00573             //                  cout << bankLoad << endl;
00574             //                  cout << endl;
00575             if (maxBankLoad[k]<bankLoad)                // if maxBankLoad is less than bankload
00576                 maxBankLoad[k]=bankLoad;                        // set this bank's load to maxBankLoad
00577         }
00578     }
00579 
00580     for (j=0;j<NO_OF_THREADS;j++)                       // if maxBankLoad is 0, 
00581         if (maxBankLoad[j]==0)                          // set it to high value so that
00582             maxBankLoad[j]=MAX_BUFFER_SIZE+1;           // its priority is the least
00583 
00584     for (j=0;j<NO_OF_THREADS;j++)                               
00585         if (totalLoad[j]==0)                            // Similar for Total Load
00586             totalLoad[j]=MAX_BUFFER_SIZE+1;
00587 
00588     UInt highest=0;
00589     for (j=0;j<NO_OF_THREADS;j++)                               // find the thread with highest bank load
00590         if (maxBankLoad[j]>maxBankLoad[highest])
00591             highest = j;
00592         else if (maxBankLoad[j]==maxBankLoad[highest] && totalLoad[j]>totalLoad[highest])
00593             highest = j;
00594 
00595     //  cout << highest << endl;
00596     return highest;
00597 
00598 }
00599 
00600 void BankHandler::SetReadsOWrite(CallerType caller, cache_command cmdType)
00601 {
00602     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);
00603     if (cmdType == CACHE_READ || cmdType == CACHE_PREFETCH || cmdType == CACHE_WRITE)
00604         tempRank->readsOWrite++;
00605 
00606     switch (caller)
00607     {
00608         case HIT_FIRST:
00609             //       if (cmdType != CACHE_READ && cmdType != CACHE_PREFETCH && cmdType != CACHE_WRITE)  
00610             //          tempRank->readsOWrite = 0;      
00611             break;
00612         case OLDEST_FIRST:
00613             if (cmdType != CACHE_READ && cmdType != CACHE_PREFETCH && cmdType != CACHE_WRITE)   
00614                 tempRank->readsOWrite = 0;      
00615             break;
00616         case UNMARKED_FIRST:
00617             if (cmdType != CACHE_READ && cmdType != CACHE_PREFETCH && cmdType != CACHE_WRITE)   
00618                 tempRank->readsOWrite = 0;      
00619             break;
00620         case HIGHEST_RANKED_FIRST:
00621             if (cmdType != CACHE_READ && cmdType != CACHE_PREFETCH && cmdType != CACHE_WRITE)   
00622                 tempRank->readsOWrite = 0;
00623             break;
00624         default:
00625             break;
00626     }
00627     //      cout << dec << tempRank->readsOWrite << endl;       
00628 }
00629 
00630 void BankHandler::SetBypasses(unsigned int index)
00631 {
00632     unsigned int i;
00633     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);
00634 
00635     for (i=0; i<tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId].size(); i++)        
00636     {
00637         if (tempRank->rbuffer[bufferId][i].bankNo == bankId)
00638             break;
00639     }
00640 
00641     if (index == i)
00642         bypassReq = 0;
00643     else if (index > i)
00644         bypassReq++;
00645     else
00646         cout << "Error: Bypasses got less than 1st req in the bank. Should not come here" << endl;                      
00647 }
00648 
00649 void BankHandler::SetPrevState()
00650 {
00651     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);
00652     prevBufferIndex = rowBufferIndex;
00653     prevRowOpen = rowOpen;
00654     prevBypassReq = bypassReq;
00655     tempRank->prevReadsOWrite = tempRank->readsOWrite;          
00656 }
00657 
00658 void BankHandler::RestorePrevState()
00659 {
00660     RankHandler * tempRank = ((RankHandler*)myRank);
00661     rowBufferIndex = prevBufferIndex;
00662     rowOpen = prevRowOpen;
00663     bypassReq = prevBypassReq;
00664     tempRank->readsOWrite = tempRank->prevReadsOWrite;  
00665 }
